name: Angular momentum (VicoPTP)
description:
Made in three days for the 49th ludum dare jam ! In this game with the theme "unstable" you collect coins on a wobbly platform ! You can drag and drop boxes from a reserve to create new floors for you to stand on ! 

This game was made in a hurry, but it should be playable ;) It also has a fully fledged random level generator

A big thanks goes out to https://simpingtuna.itch.io/ for making the music, sound and the prototypes for the boxes in addition of being a smashing guy !
